name: ALATA - Dark Ages
description:
ALATA is a dark ages themed puzzle platformer video game based on "Dark grandma"  Israeli childrens analog game hide and seek (in the dark).

Made as part of a indie games studio delivered by lecturer Dani Bacon in Bezalel Academy of Arts and design.

Controls

[Right Arrow] - Turn right

[Left Arrow] - Turn left

[Up Arrow] - Speed Boost

Credits

OST: Eyal Werber

Engine: Unity 2020

Language: Hebrew
